projects.description: Delivered critical enhancements to bidirectional sync mechanism to allow advanced DevOps users to leverage Harness platform through YAML instead of UI. It helped improve the experience of non-UI heavy users of the app who only wanted to interact via Git.

projects.name: Online Portfolio
projects.description: Created an online portfolio using Gatsby & Contentful for CMS and Netlify for automated deployments.
